meanings.definition: A photograph made by a process in which an image is produced on a light-sensitive metallic plate.
meanings.sent1: I saw some old ferrotypes at the museum.
meanings.sent2: Photographers used to create ferrotypes on metal plates.
meanings.sent3: The ferrotypes in the exhibit looked like they were from a different time.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like ferrotypes, captured forever in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The ferrotypes gleamed under the museum lights, preserving moments in history.

meanings.definition: To produce a photograph using the ferrotype process.
meanings.sent1: She ferrotypes her family portraits for a vintage look.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often ferrotype images for a unique effect.
meanings.sent3: He ferrotypes every vacation photo to give them an antique feel.
meanings.sent4: The artist ferrotypes moments of everyday life, turning them into art.
meanings.sent5: Ferrotypes capture moments in time, freezing them for eternity.
